encodeClusteredImageBinaryStack(VectorProcessor, int[][], float[][]) - Method in class clustering.fcm.FCMManager
 
encodeClusteredImageBinaryStack(VectorProcessor, int[][], float[][]) - Method in class clustering.kmeans.KMeansManager
 
encodeClusteredImageBinaryStack(VectorProcessor, int[][], float[][]) - Method in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
Encodes the input images into a new one representing the clustering partition resulted from the algorithm by using a stack whose slices are binary images representing the membership of a pixel to a specified cluster (each slice represents a different cluster)
encodeClusteredImageFuzzyStack(VectorProcessor, float[][], float[][]) - Method in class clustering.fcm.FCMManager
 
encodeClusteredImageFuzzyStack(VectorProcessor, float[][], float[][]) - Method in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
Encodes the input images into a new one representing the fuzzy clustering partition resulted from the algorithm by using a stack whose slices are gray scaled images representing the fuzzy membership of a pixel to a specified cluster (each slice represents a different cluster)

encodeClusteredImageInRGB(VectorProcessor, int[][], float[][], int[], int) - Method in class clustering.fcm.FCMManager
 
encodeClusteredImageInRGB(VectorProcessor, int[][], float[][], int[], int) - Method in class clustering.kmeans.KMeansManager
 
encodeClusteredImageInRGB(VectorProcessor, int[][], float[][], int[], int) - Method in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
Encodes an image into a RGB colored images according to the clustering results, it assigns each cluster a random generated color using @link{ColorManger} and each pixel will assume the color of the cluster it belongs to.

encodeClusteredImageWithClusterCenterColors(VectorProcessor, int[][], float[][]) - Method in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
Encodes an image into a RGB colored images according to the clustering results, each pixel will assume the RGB color of the centroid whose cluster it belongs to.

euclideanDistanceMatrix(float[][], float[][], double[][], double) - Static method in class clustering.fcm.FCM
 
euclideanDistanceMatrix(float[][], float[][], double[][], double) - Static method in class clustering.sfcm.SFCM
Computes a distance matrix starting from two sample x features matrixes It is used to precompute all the distances between the samples and the centroids and it is used to update the cluster membership matrix U: The distance matrix holds one more column used to precompute the sum of the inverse exponentiated distances between all the centroids and a sample.
